sentences.cn: 特点: 外观大胆, 能力非凡.

sentences.en: He did a very workmanlike job on it.
sentences.cn: 他这件工作做得非常漂亮.

sentences.en: Hers is less workmanlike than the other books and refreshingly unideological.
sentences.cn: 她的书不像其它书那般精巧,并且不涉及意识形态也让人耳目一新.

sentences.en: Really it's a workmanlike conference rather than a dramatic one.
sentences.cn: 会议的确开得有板有眼，但谈不上激动人心。

sentences.en: The book is a workmanlike job with chronology and bibliography and index.
sentences.cn: 这本书像是一部精致的作品,具有纪年表、传记参考文献和索引.

sentences.en: The script was workmanlike at best.
sentences.cn: 这个剧本充其量就是匠人之作。

sentences.en: The team produced a very workmanlike performance.
sentences.cn: 这个队技巧表现得十分熟练.

sentences.en: The team put up a good workmanlike performance to win 1-0.
sentences.cn: 该队技术娴熟，表现卖力，以一比零获胜。

trans.tran_cn: <褒>技术熟练的，有技巧的，精工细作的
